post_content: Looking to buy 206s that look much better than their assigned grade. HOFers and commons, any back, PSA or SGC. Attached photo an example of what I am looking for. Please PM if you have any like this available. Thanks!
Hi, I have an SGC A Waddell port that is beautiful. It is an A because of a slight trim. Other than that the card is awesome. Let me know if you're interested!
